description: Tree works subject to Tollington Court, Tollington Park TPO No. 162 (1997). Works: T1:  Robinia:   Crown lift to 3m., crown thin by 25%                        (T3 on application).        T3:  Robinia:   Crown lift to 6m., crown thin by 30%,                        deadwood (T2 on application).        T4:  Sycamore:  No action (T1 on application).        T5:  Sycamore:  Prune back from building by 2m.,                        crown thin by 20% (T8 on                        application).
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the tree work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
